title: run
body:
#!/bin/bash

# Adjust this if your project lives elsewhere
PROJECT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "$0")" && pwd)"
VENV_DIR="$PROJECT_DIR/funkit-env"
PYTHON_BIN="$VENV_DIR/bin/python"

# Sanity check
if [ ! -x "$PYTHON_BIN" ]; then
  echo "❌ Python virtualenv not found at $PYTHON_BIN"
  echo "Make sure to create it with:"
  echo "  python3.13 -m venv funkit-env"
  exit 1
fi

# Optional: Print Python version
echo "✅ Using Python: $($PYTHON_BIN --version)"

# Launch your GUI app
"$PYTHON_BIN" "$PROJECT_DIR/main.py"
